attributes.action: Encourage councils to abolish council tax for serving members of the Armed forces!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even when single/unmarried memebers of HM Forces are serving abroad they are forced to pay FULL council tax even though they are not in that council district. They also pay Cilcot (council tax to the council where they are based) direct from there Pay.  Council tax should be frozen as soon as serving soldiers, sailors and airmen are called away on duty!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
